<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108483</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108483</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202649</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Walk the Line</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehen die Zeile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Marchent la ligne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Anda a linha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cammina la riga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περπατήστε τη γραμμή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recorre la línea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson demonstrates the effects of changing the slope and y-intercept on the graph and equation of a line.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion zeigt die Effekte des Änderns der 
Steigung und y-fängt auf dem Diagramm und der Gleichung einer Zeile 
ab.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon démontre les effets de changer la 
pente et y-les arrête sur le graphique et l'équation d'une ligne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição demonstra os efeitos de mudar a 
inclinação e y-intercepta-os no gráfico e na equação de uma 
linha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione dimostra gli effetti di cambiare il
pendio e y-intercetta sul grafico e sull'equazione di una riga.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα καταδεικνύει τα αποτελέσματα της 
αλλαγής της κλίσης και της Υ-παρεμπόδισης στη γραφική παράσταση 
και την εξίσωση μιας γραμμής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección demuestra los efectos de cambiar la 
cuesta y y-los intercepta en el gráfico y la ecuación de una línea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
